interface.name: ias_mode
interface.description: Represents a possible width, height, and refresh rate of a CRTC.

request.name: add
request.description: Do nothing for now. This is to force the interface to get created.

interface.name: ias_crtc
interface.description: A CRTC represents a hardware pipe. Each CRTC has a primary display plane and possibly one or more sprite planes. During normal operation a CRTC drives exactly one output, but in dualview/stereo setups, it is possible to drive two outputs from a single CRTC.

event.name: mode
event.description: Advertises a mode that the CRTC supports. Note that in dualview and stereo setups, this mode is actually a combination of the modes of the two displays being driven.

event.name: gamma
event.description: Advertises the current gamma setting for the CRTC.

event.name: contrast
event.description: Advertises the current contrast setting for the CRTC.

event.name: brightness
event.description: Advertises the current brightness setting for the CRTC.

request.name: set_mode
request.description: Changes the mode of a CRTC. Note that in cases where a CRTC is driving multiple displays, this will result in a mode change on both of those displays.

request.name: set_gamma
request.description: Sets the gamma correction for a CRTC.

request.name: set_contrast
request.description: Sets the contrast for a CRTC.

request.name: set_brightness
request.description: Sets the brightness for a CRTC.

interface.name: ias_output
interface.description: An output represents a distinct display (or one "view" of a dualview display). In normal setups there is a single output per CRTC. In dualview and stereo 3D setups, there are two outputs per CRTC.

request.name: set_xy
request.description: Sets the location of the output.

request.name: disable
request.description: Disables a display output. Disabling a display will not adjust the compositor coordinates of the other displays managed by the compositor. If two outputs are being driven off a single CRTC, this will have no effect on the other output.

request.name: enable
request.description: Enables a previously disabled display output. If two outputs are being driven off a single CRTC, this will have no effect on the other output.

request.name: scale_to
request.description: Scales an output to cover a smaller or larger area than the output's mode.

request.name: set_fb_transparency
request.description: Enables or disables transparency in the pixel format for the fb.

event.name: name
event.description: Advertises the name of this output.
